name: test_e2e_with_logs[223_CMD_FILE_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_FILE_002` |
| **Name** | SSH key exfiltration |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | file_manipulation |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `&& cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa`
- **Encoded**: `%26%26%20cat%20~%2F.ssh%2Fid_rsa`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~17000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:19:34.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_FILE_002-1768119574034-bn9rsnf pattern_id=CMD_FILE_002 uri=/?q=%26%26%20cat%20~%2F.ssh%2Fid_rsa client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
